oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Civil War claim of Thomas J. Hill filed by his widow Laura A. Hill
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Civil War claim of Thomas J. Hill, filed by widow, Laura A. Hill. $8,850 is claimed. Hill claims that Union soldiers took hogs, cattle, corn, and other items.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Fort Negley, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
